Title: Casus Belli
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Chip Johannessen
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Elizabeth Marvel, F. Murray Abraham
Plot: In the wake of devastation, Keane finds herself sidelined, Carrie makes a surprising discovery, and Peter's paranoia leads to chaos.
